meanings.definition: Biopics: Films that depict the life of a real person.
meanings.sent1: I watched a biopic about a famous scientist last night.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching biopics about historical figures.
meanings.sent3: The biopic about the inventor was both educational and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a biopic, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The biopic brought the historical figure's story to life on screen.
